channel.title: Simple Questions
channel.description: I know there are simple and some people already asks but im lazy so here are my questions. 1-How do I add a menu like ::commands or something like that 2-Jagex updates. Does anyone have the item placement(I know someone already answered this but not alot only the main items) 3-Can someone give me the code to make varrock a safe zone. 4-How do i change the hit points of a monster and what they hit on you. 5-How do i make it so the train tele in the emote list changes it name(i tried to change it but it didnt work. 6-And does anyone get bored of having a server or like tired of people bugging you?And its so hard to hold you get fustrated.

item.title: Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

I know there are simple and some people already asks but im lazy so here are my questions.
1-How do I add a menu like ::commands or something like that
2-Jagex updates. Does anyone have the item placement(I know someone already answered this but not alot only the main items)
3-Can someone give me the code to make varrock a safe zone.
4-How do i change the hit points of a monster and what they hit on you.
5-How do i make it so the train tele in the emote list changes it name(i tried to change it but it didnt work.
6-And does anyone get bored of having a server or like tired of people bugging you?And its so hard to hold you get fustrated.

Read full topic
